members.docComment:
/**
 * Calculates the network fee required to process the transaction. The fields signers, attributes and script needs to be fully populated for this to work.
 *
 * @deprecated
 *
 * use the smartCalculateNetworkFee helper instead.
 *
 * @param txn - A partially filled out transaction.
 *
 * @param feePerByte - The current feePerByte in Policy contract.
 *
 * @param signingAccts - The accounts that will be signing this.
 */
members.name: calculateNetworkFee
getFeeInformation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Claims all the gas available for the specified account. Do note that GAS is automatically claimed when you perform a transaction involving NEO.
 *
 * @param acct - The account to claim gas on
 *
 * @param config - Configuration
 */
members.name: claimGas
getCandidates

members.docComment:
/**
 * Signs a transaction according to the signing configuration. The input transaction is modified with the signatures and returned.
 *
 * @param txn - Transaction to sign
 *
 * @param config - Configuration
 *
 * @returns 
 */
members.name: sign

members.docComment:
/**
 * Constructs and executes a transaction of multiple token transfers
 *
 * @param intents - Token transfers
 *
 * @param config - Configuration
 */
members.name: transferToken

members.docComment:
/**
 * Performs validation of all attributes on the given transaction.
 *
 * @param txn - Transaction to validate
 */
members.name: validate

members.docComment:
/**
 * Adds a signature field representing the request for a signature from this account. Under the hood, this adds a Signer and empty Witness to the transaction. The Signer defaults to the basic scope. For more advanced usage, plase manually add your own Signers and Witnesses.
 *
 * @param account - account that has to sign the transaction.
 */
members.name: addBasicSignatureField
addContractCall
addEmptyWitness

members.docComment:
/**
 * Adds the logic for claiming gas. Alternatively, you may just trigger the gas claim by performing an actual transaction involving NEO.
 *
 * @param account - Account to claim gas on.
 */
members.name: addGasClaim

members.docComment:
/**
 * Adds the logic to send tokens around.
 *
 * @param account - originating account
 *
 * @param destination - account where the tokens will be sent
 *
 * @param tokenScriptHash - scripthash of the token contract
 *
 * @param amt - Amount of tokens in integer format.
 */
members.name: addNep17Transfer
addSigners

members.docComment:
/**
 * Adds the logic to vote for a candidate.
 *
 * @param account - Account containing the NEO.
 *
 * @param candidatePublicKey - The candidate's publickey in hex big endian.
 */
members.name: addVote

members.docComment:
/**
 * Sets an account to pay fees for this transaction. The first Signer defaults to the payer.
 *
 * @param account - Account to pay fees from.
 */
members.name: setFeeAccount
TransactionSigner

members.docComment:
/**
 * Sign a transaction with Accounts or Private Keys. This is used when you have full access to signer accounts
 *
 * @param accounts - accounts that will sign this transaction
 */
members.name: signWithAccount

members.docComment:
/**
 * Sign a transaction with multi-signatures for multi-sig account
 *
 * @param multisigAccount - multisig account
 *
 * @param witnesses - signatures from accounts within the multisig-account
 */
members.name: signWithMultiSigAccount

members.docComment:
/**
 * Sign a transaction with Witnesses. This can be used when you accept a signature from someone else
 *
 * @param witnesses - witnesses that will be added to the transaction
 */
members.name: signWithWitness
transaction
TransactionValidator
rpcClient
transaction

members.docComment:
/**
 * Validate NetworkFee
 *
 * @param autoFix - autofix when fee is too low.
 */
members.name: validateNetworkFee
validateScript

members.docComment:
/**
 * validate systemFee
 *
 * @param autoFix - autofix when fee is too low.
 */
members.name: validateSystemFee

members.docComment:
/**
 * validate validUntilBlock.
 *
 * @param autoFix - autofix when number is below current height.
 */
members.name: validateValidUntilBlock
valid
